The big news is that Thursday night we became official!
After a hectic week of many secret meetings and discussions we were finally able to come together in the cave near East Commons to have our new guild officially formed.
Several beers were drank and some of us had virtual hangovers the next day! The celebration will continue this Wednesday night at 9:30 Eastern, in the Freeport Arena. Where no doubt more alcohol will be consumed as we test each others mettle with feats of strength and daring-do!
A New Journey Begins...

Welcome and Congrats!
By Kamdar Entil'Zha
7/17/01
Faliani, Khaba, Kobiashi and Sajahh have just recently joined our ranks. Please make them feel welcome! Also, Wamphyre's alternate, Quijang has joined us and Arathain has finally made it official and has become a full fledged member! Last night was my first time meeting Arathain face to face. Imagine my surprise when I learned he is the spitting image of me, even down to his Ivy Etched armor! Twins separated at birth? I don't know, but I will say he is certainly a handsome devil!
More New Members!
By Kamdar Entil'Zha
7/19/01
I tried to get something like this going at that other guild...and I didn't get any takers...so here we go again!

I have started creating personal profile pages for our members. So far Me, Arri, Cobo, Tanluin, Arathain, Chonn, Wamphyre, Wyndlancer, Dannman, Quijang and Sajaah have pages up. You can access them by clicking on the name on the members page. I went with the members that I already had some good pix of. So far, most of these are pretty bare bones... But if you look at my page you can get an idea of the kinds of things you can put on your page. You can put anything you want on it having to do with your character (Skills, stats, equipment, stories, biographies, an attitude statement, favorite places to hang out, etc) I would recommend that you include your email address with the rest of your submissions so your fellow guildmates can get in touch with you. As always, just email me with whatever you have.

For those of you that need a refresher course on taking screenshots, my guide to EQ Photography is on the website and can be accessed through the links page.

This is your page and I would like you to have fun with it!
Member Profile Pages!
By Kamdar Entil'Zha
7/22/01
Get 'em while they're HOT!
.
Please send all submissions to Kamdar at:
doconno1@nycap.rr.com
Starting next Wednesday, August 1st Herbdiva is kicking off what we hope will be a regular Wednesday night event. (Or perhaps every other Wednesday) It's a chance for us to get together and have a little fun, with contests, parties, melee fights, trade fairs and the like! Our first event will be a fishing contest at West Commons Lake at 9pm.
Here are the ground rules set up by Herby herself!

  1. Members use the honor system.
  2. Need one fishing rod, can have a spare, and one bucket (20) count bait. Make sure there are no fish in your inventory nor any fishing grubs or bait other than a bucket of 20.
  3. Wait for the signal to begin.
  4. First one to run out of bait or we can time it, say stop, blah blah, the one with the most fish wins.
  5. Only fish count, not scales, shoes, weapons, etc.
  6. We can have a kitty where everyone pitches in 1 pp or 1 gp whatever, and the winner wins.
  7. No handy cap this time but if all goes well we can give a handy cap for lower lvl fishermen.
  8. Herbdiva will volunteer as the ref.

Some of these items will be finalized as the date draws near. Please consult the forum for the latest details, or to post your opinions on say how much each person should contribute to the pot o' pp.
Please leave a message in the forum if you plan on attending.
Herbdiva announces Wacky Wednesdays!
